memberdef.argsstring: (uint16_t port, SessionManager &sessions, long long snapshotIntervalMs=500, std::string lobbyCode="PUBLIC")
memberdef.name: UDPGameServer

briefdescription.para: Route an incoming packet to the appropriate handler.
Register a new player on receipt of a hello message.
Handle a shoot command (spawn a bullet).
Broadcast the current snapshot to all connected players.
Send a packet to a single endpoint.
Advance the local simulation based on elapsed time.
Thread loop to read incoming UDP packets without blocking the simulation tick.
Simple UDP authoritative game server that manages players and snapshots.

detaileddescription.para: The server listens on a UDP port, accepts player "hello" packets, tracks their positions/velocities, updates a small simulation loop, and periodically broadcasts snapshots to all connected players.
